p: Assays were performed according to standard methods [ 16]. Four HA units/25 μL of A(H1N1)pdm09 virus were tested using 0.5% suspensions of turkey red blood cells. HI titers were reciprocals of the highest dilutions of sera that inhibited hemagglutination. Post-infection ferret antisera against 18–19 and 19–20 vaccine viruses were treated with receptor-destroying enzyme (Denka Seiken, Tokyo, Japan).
